2.name: Transmutation Savant
2.description: The gold and time you must spend to copy a Transmutation spell into your spellbook is halved.

2.name: Experimental Alchemy
2.description: You brew two Alchemical Solutions instead of one when combining extracts, if you succeed an Alchemical DC check.

6.name: Transmuter's Stone
6.description: You can create a magical stone that grants benefits. Choose one benefit: +1 to Constitution, +1 to Intelligence, +3 m to movement speed, or +1 to Dexterity. Only one stone can be active at a time. Creating a new stone destroys the old one.

10.name: Shapechanger
10.description: Transform into a blue jay, able to Fly. If the blue jay's hit points are reduced to 0, you revert to your normal form and take any remaining damage.
